mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member( id, pwd, email, name, gender, birthday, tel,zipcode, addr1, addr2, regdate ) VALUES( #{id}, MD5(#{pwd}), #{email}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{birthday}, #{tel}, #{zipcode}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM member WHERE id=#{id} AND pwd=MD5(#{pwd});
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM member WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id FROM member WHERE name=#{name} AND email=#{email}
SELECT * FROM member WHERE name=#{name} AND id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE member SET pwd=MD5(#{pwd}) WHERE no=#{no}
